description: Index of second half of decomposition of integers into pairs based on A000695.
comments: One coordinate of a recursive non-self intersecting walk on the square lattice Z^2.
formula: n = A000695(A059905(n))+2*A000695(a(n))To get a(n), write n as Sum b_j*2^j, then a(n)=Sum b_(2j+1)*2^j. [From _Vladimir Shevelev_, Nov 13 2008]a(n)=Sum_k>=0 {A030308(n,k)*b(k)} with b(0)=0 and b(k)=A077957(k-1) for k>0.- From _Philippe Del√©ham_, Oct 18 2011.
author: _Marc LeBrun_, Feb 07 2001
